==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
He is a promoter of [[Fonta]] from the Fonta Company. He traveled to [[Meropide]] to sell the drink to the prisoners. However, [[Wriothesley]] rejected his business proposals, explaining the value of [[Credit Coupons]].
